name: On Your Marks
description:
The concept behind On Your Marks is a platformer with no enemies or deadly obstacles. Instead the challenge is derived from the act of platforming, mastering the simple mechanics to overcome the obstacles and reach the end of each level. Fast completion times is its own reward, and this becomes crucial during the final race.

Known issues:

Monitor resolutions other than 1280 x 720 can cause scaling issues. Restarting the game typically fixes this.

If multiple achievements pop then their pop-up is obscured by one another.
